They need to pay for the rest of their treatment and then claim a refund

You cannot use this service to apply for a PRC as you’ve told us that the person you’re applying on behalf of has paid more than a co-payment or patient contribution for their treatment.

They will need to pay the full amount of treatment costs and then claim a refund.

Claiming a refund

Depending on the country, a visitor may be expected to pay for all or part of the bill upfront and then claim a refund afterwards.

They can claim back the difference between the total bill and the co-payment, but the actual co-payment is not refundable.

They should keep all invoices, receipts, and any other paperwork. They or their insurance company may need them to apply for a refund.

Contact us to claim a refund.
